name: Ice Control
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Choose two of the following effects. You can't target a creature or area twice with the same effect, but you can still choose the same effect twice otherwise.
* You form a thin layer of ice armor around target creature. They gain 3 DR until they take damage.
* You chill the bones of a target creature. Their movement speed is reduced by 5 feet for 1 minute.
* You freeze a 5 foot radius surface of water. It remains firmly frozen for 1 minute, during which anything can pass over it, then thaws over 1 hour, cracking if more than 200 pounds crosses the ice.
* You lower the temperature around you by up to 30 degrees Celsius. This remains for up to 8 hours.
* You create an object of ice that fits within a 5 foot cube. It is destroyed if it takes any damage, and otherwise remains for 1 hour.
